thread.title_full: F**k you : First live Jono and Ben episode a shambles - Yahoo New Zealand

author: Yahoo New Zealand On February
title: F**k you : First live Jono and Ben episode a shambles - Yahoo New Zealand
text:
Share F**k you : First live Jono and Ben episode a shambles - Yahoo New Zealand Disaster stuck on Jono and Ben's first live TV show when Guy Williams dropped an F-bomb during the 7.30pm time slot. Close 'F**k you': First live Jono and Ben episode turns into 'shambles' UP NEXT VIDEO 'F**k you': First live Jono and Ben episode turns into 'shambles'. Source: Three 'F**k you': First live Jono and Ben episode turns into 'shambles' 
Jono Pryor and Ben Boyce were half way through their new show on Thursday night when their first slip major slip up occurred thanks to the loose lips of Guy Williams. 
Following a joke about Williams, the comedian turned to Jono and Ben to say "f**k you" before realising his mistake. 
Jono and Ben buried their heads in their hands in disbelief, with Williams blushing in shame at his slip up. Guy Williams covers his face after realising his slip up. Photo: Three 
The hosts quickly took the opportunity to put the knife into Williams, comparing the incident to when Willy Moon and Natalia Kills had an unbelievable meltdown on The X Factor NZ. 
"Natalia Kills, Willy Moon, Guy Williams - the three people who lose their jobs after their first live taping," Jono joked. Jono burries his head as Ben laughs at Guy Williams' mistake. Photo: Three 
Guest comedian Laura Daniel got in on the act, while Boyce joked that "your brother will be taking over the show next week after that f-bomb." 
Boyce then cut to an ad break, saying: I'm sorry... This is a shambles." 
Guy Williams repeatedly apologised on air for the slip up before taking to Twitter to say: "It won't happen again." Guy would like to apologize to everyone who was offended by his bad language tonight, especially to his mum #jonoandben â€” Jono and Ben (@JonoAndBen) February 23, 2017 
Viewers took to Twitter following the F-bomb slip up. 
"#jonoandben that was trash I'm ashamed to waste data to say I watched it. Overpaid d listers with open mic operator shitty jokes. cancel plz", @JoshwaBuchanan wrote. #jonoandben that was trash I'm ashamed to waste data to say I watched it. Overpaid d listers with open mic operator shitty jokes.cancel plz â€” Joshwa Buchanan (@JoshwaBuchanan) February 23, 2017 
Another wrote the slip up wasn't surprising. @JonoAndBen Well @guywilliamsguy f-bombed on their first live. Gotta break it to ya. It was not too much of a surprise for me ðŸ˜‚ #jonoandben
